content.raw:
I don't think this will get us the `dart-collision-ode` component, since I think `libdart6-dev` only contains the development package of the core dart library, and not the optional components like `dart-collision-bullet` and `dart-collision-ode`.

I'm actually not sure how this has been working for us up until now, since `ign-physics` has been depending on the `dart-collision-bullet` library, which isn't accounted for here. I wonder if the `ignition-physics-dartsim` plugin has been going unbuilt? That wouldn't raise any build or test errors since it's considered an optional component of `ignition-physics`.
content.html:
I don't think this will get us the dart-collision-ode component, since I think libdart6-dev only contains the development package of the core dart library, and not the optional components like dart-collision-bullet and dart-collision-ode.

I'm actually not sure how this has been working for us up until now, since ign-physics has been depending on the dart-collision-bullet library, which isn't accounted for here. I wonder if the ignition-physics-dartsim plugin has been going unbuilt? That wouldn't raise any build or test errors since it's considered an optional component of ignition-physics.
